title: Print, "Versailles, the Marble Court of the Chateau, Festival Around the Fountain.", 1676
medium: Etching and engraving. Black ink on rolled paper.
inscribed:
Engraved on the plate at lower left:  "Le Pautre, Sculps.  1676"
Inscription lower left:  "Quatrieme Journee.  Festin, dont la table estoit dressee autour de la fontaine de la cour de marbre du Chasteau de Versailles, au dessus de laquelle s'elevoit une columne toute de lumiere."
Lower right:  "Dies Quartus.  Caena, cujus mensaextructa erat circa fontem marmorei caudaedij Versaliarum, supra cujus apicem columna ignea exugebat."
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Horizontal rectangle:  At center, in a court of the chateau, a fountain is surrounded by a temporary structure and an octagonal banquet table.  Above the fountain, a victory column illuminated by candles.  Soldiers hold back a crowd on three sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Versailles, the Marble Court of the Chateau, Festival Around the Fountain.", 1676.
1676. Etching and engraving. Black ink on rolled paper.. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-86-65.
